sftRequestData Struct Reference
[Sensor Application]

#include <sensors.h>

Detailed Description

Sensor data request packet, sent by coordinator to ask sensor node to reply with its computed data.

Definition at line 127 of file sensors.h.


Data Fields

u8 type
 Frame type, see CAL_REQ_INFO_FRAME and REQ_RAW_DATA_FRAME.
u16 time
 Interval between data frames, in 100mSec intervals.
